test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Test for Wearable Devices
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom API integration with wearable devices for real-time data exchange as specified in URS-CTMS-005.
prerequisites: Veeva CTMS platform installed and configured
Wearable device simulator or actual device available

test_steps.action: Configure the wearable device simulator to send test data to the CTMS API endpoint.
test_steps.expected_result: Device simulator successfully connects to the API endpoint.

test_steps.action: Send a predefined set of test data from the wearable device simulator to the CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Test data is received and stored in the CTMS database.

test_steps.action: Verify the data in the CTMS matches the sent test data.
test_steps.expected_result: Data in CTMS matches the test data sent from the wearable device.

acceptance_criteria: Wearable device data is successfully received by the CTMS.
Data integrity is maintained during transmission and storage.
System logs confirm successful data exchange.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must not be altered during transmission.
All data exchanges must be logged.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Adaptive Trial Design Module Functionality Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality of the custom adaptive trial design module as per URS-CTMS-003.
prerequisites: Custom adaptive trial design module installed
User with appropriate permissions logged in

test_steps.action: Load a test adaptive trial protocol into the CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully loaded and displayed in the system.

test_steps.action: Simulate patient enrollment data to trigger adaptive design changes.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly processes enrollment data and suggests design modifications.

test_steps.action: Apply suggested design modifications and verify system updates.
test_steps.expected_result: System updates trial parameters according to adaptive design rules.

acceptance_criteria: System correctly implements adaptive trial design algorithms.
All modifications are properly logged in the audit trail.
User interface reflects current trial design parameters accurately.
data_integrity_requirements: All trial design changes must be traceable.
Original protocol must be preserved in read-only format.

test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality and reliability of custom APIs developed for real-time data exchange with wearable devices and AI-based image analysis systems.

test_steps.action: Initiate data transmission from wearable devices to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully received and processed by CTMS.

test_steps.action: Send image analysis results from AI system to CTMS using custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Image analysis data is accurately integrated into CTMS.

acceptance_criteria: All data transmissions are successful
Data integrity is maintained
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure no data loss during transmission

test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Access custom dashboard and verify all visualizations are displayed correctly.
test_steps.expected_result: All visualizations are accurate and up-to-date.

test_steps.action: Perform a trial data update and check dashboard refresh.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard updates within 5 minutes of data changes.

acceptance_criteria: All visualizations are accurate
Dashboard updates within specified time

test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality and reliability of custom APIs developed for real-time data exchange with wearable devices and AI-based image analysis systems.

test_steps.action: Send test data from wearable device simulator to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully received and processed by CTMS.

test_steps.action: Send test image data from AI-based image analysis system to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Image data is successfully received and processed by CTMS.

acceptance_criteria: All test data is accurately processed and stored in CTMS.
API response time meets performance requirements.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission and storage.

test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Load sample data into CTMS and navigate to custom dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard displays data accurately with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Filter and sort data using dashboard controls.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard updates visualizations based on applied filters and sorts.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays data accurately and updates visualizations in real-time.
Filter and sort functions work as expected.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during visualization updates.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Adaptive Trial Design Module Functionality Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom adaptive trial design module correctly implements proprietary algorithms and integrates with the in-house randomization system.
prerequisites: Custom adaptive trial design module installed

test_steps.action: Configure a test adaptive trial design using the proprietary algorithms.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts configuration and displays correct trial parameters.

test_steps.action: Initiate patient randomization through the integrated system.
test_steps.expected_result: Randomization occurs according to protocol with correct integration.

acceptance_criteria: All adaptive trial design configurations function as specified
Randomization integration works without errors
System maintains data integrity throughout
data_integrity_requirements: All trial design changes must be audit trailed
Randomization data must be immutable once committed

test_cases.test_name: Real-time Wearable Device Data Integration Test
test_cases.objective: Validate that custom APIs correctly receive and process real-time data from wearable devices.

test_steps.action: Simulate continuous data transmission from test wearable device.
test_steps.expected_result: System receives and acknowledges all data packets without loss.

test_steps.action: Verify data appears in patient records within 5 minutes of receipt.
test_steps.expected_result: All wearable data correctly associated with patient records and visible in UI.

acceptance_criteria: 100% of test data received and processed
Data appears in system within specified 5-minute window
All data properly associated with correct patient records
data_integrity_requirements: All wearable data must maintain provenance metadata

test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of custom APIs developed for real-time data exchange with wearable devices and AI-based image analysis systems.

test_steps.action: Initiate data transmission from wearable device to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully received and processed by CTMS.

test_steps.action: Send image data from AI-based image analysis system to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Image data is correctly integrated and displayed in CTMS.

acceptance_criteria: All data transmissions are successful
Data integrity is maintained

test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Access custom dashboard and verify visualizations.
test_steps.expected_result: Visualizations accurately represent the underlying data.

test_steps.action: Update test data and refresh dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard updates reflect the changes within 5 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: Visualizations are accurate
Dashboard updates within specified time

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Test for Wearable Devices
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of custom APIs for real-time data exchange with wearable devices as specified in URS-CTMS-005.
prerequisites: CTMS system is installed and operational
Test data for wearable device output is prepared

test_steps.action: Configure the wearable device simulator to send test data to the CTMS via the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: CTMS receives the test data without errors.

test_steps.action: Verify the received data in the CTMS dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Data from the wearable device is displayed correctly in the dashboard.

acceptance_criteria: API successfully receives and processes data from wearable devices
Data is accurately reflected in the CTMS dashboard within 5 minutes
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be encrypted during transmission
All data exchanges must be logged

test_cases.test_name: Custom Adaptive Trial Design Module Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality of the custom adaptive trial design module as specified in URS-CTMS-003.
prerequisites: CTMS system is installed and operational
Test adaptive trial protocol is loaded

test_steps.action: Load the test adaptive trial protocol into the CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully loaded and recognized by the system.

test_steps.action: Simulate patient enrollment and data input to trigger adaptive design changes.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly applies adaptive design changes based on input data.

acceptance_criteria: System correctly implements adaptive trial design changes
All changes are logged in the audit trail
data_integrity_requirements: All adaptive changes must be traceable

test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of custom APIs developed for real-time data exchange with wearable devices and AI-based image analysis systems.

test_steps.action: Initiate data transmission from wearable devices to CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is received and processed by CTMS without errors.

test_steps.action: Send image analysis results from AI system to CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Image analysis data is integrated into CTMS and available for reporting.

acceptance_criteria: All data transmissions are successful
No data loss or corruption

test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Access custom dashboard for patient enrollment tracking.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard displays accurate enrollment data with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Generate a specialized report combining CTMS data with external real-world evidence.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated successfully and includes accurate combined data.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboards display accurate data
Reports include correct combined data

test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality and reliability of custom APIs developed for real-time data exchange with wearable devices, AI-based image analysis systems, and proprietary biomarker databases.

test_steps.action: Initiate data exchange with wearable devices using the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data from wearable devices is successfully received and processed by the CTMS.

test_steps.action: Send image data to the AI-based image analysis system via the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Image analysis results are returned and integrated into the CTMS.

test_steps.action: Query proprietary biomarker databases using the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Biomarker data is retrieved and displayed in the CTMS.

acceptance_criteria: All custom APIs function as expected
Data integrity is maintained
Response times meet performance requirements

test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards with advanced visualizations developed for the CTMS.

test_steps.action: Access the custom dashboard for patient enrollment tracking.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard displays accurate and up-to-date enrollment data.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the custom dashboard for safety signal detection.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard correctly identifies and visualizes safety signals.

test_steps.action: Use the custom dashboard for trial financial management.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard provides accurate financial data and visualizations.

acceptance_criteria: All custom dashboards function as expected
Data visualizations are accurate and clear
Dashboards update in real-time

test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality and reliability of custom APIs developed for real-time data exchange with wearable devices, AI-based image analysis systems, and proprietary biomarker databases.

test_steps.action: Initiate data exchange from wearable devices to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data from wearable devices is successfully received and processed by CTMS.

test_steps.action: Send image analysis results from AI system to CTMS via custom API.

test_steps.expected_result: Biomarker data is successfully retrieved and displayed in CTMS.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Dashboards and Advanced Visualizations Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards and advanced visualizations developed for CTMS.

test_steps.action: Load sample data sets into CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample data is successfully loaded and displayed in CTMS.

test_steps.action: Navigate to custom dashboards and verify visualizations.
test_steps.expected_result: Custom dashboards display accurate and meaningful visualizations.

test_steps.action: Perform real-time updates on sample data and observe dashboard changes.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboards update within 5 minutes of data changes.

acceptance_criteria: Custom dashboards function as expected
Visualizations are accurate and meaningful

test_cases.objective: Verify that the CTMS dashboard updates within 5 minutes of data changes as per URS-CTMS-020.

test_steps.action: Simulate a data change in the CTMS system.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard reflects the change within 5 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard updates within 5 minutes of data changes
